tables.name: bikeshare_db.
tables.schema: CREATE TABLE schema_a.rides (Trip_Id int, Trip_Duration, Start_Station_Id int, Start_Time timestamp, Start_Station_Name varchar, End_Station_Id int, End_Time timestamp, End_Station_Name varchar, Bike_Id int, User_Type varchar, Model varchar);
tables.description: This table stores bikeshare toronto's ridership information at the ride level, with each trip representing one unlock and lock.

columns.name: Trip_Duration
columns.description: duration of the trip in seconds

columns.name: Start_Station_Id
columns.description: ID of the station where trip started

columns.name: Start_Station_Name
columns.description: name of the station where trip started

columns.name: End_Station_Id
columns.description: ID of the station where trip ended

columns.name: End_Station_Name
columns.description: name of the station where trip ended

columns.name: Bike_Id
columns.description: unique identifier for the bike used

columns.name: User_Type
columns.description: type of user (annual member or casual member)

columns.name: ym_id
columns.description: identifier for year and month of trip

sample_queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_trips FROM schema_a.rides WHERE User_Type = 'annual member' AND DATE(Start_Time) = '2023-01-01'
sample_queries.user_input: How many trips were taken by annual members on January 1st, 2023?

sample_queries.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_trips FROM schema_a.rides WHERE User_Type = 'annual member' AND DATE(Start_Time) = '2023-01-01'
sample_queries.user_input: How many trips were taken by annual members on January 1st, 2023?

tables.name: schema_a.stations
tables.schema: CREATE TABLE schema_a.stations (station_id int, lat float, lon float);
tables.description: This table stores the details of bike share stations including their locations.

sample_queries.query: SELECT s.station_id, s.lat, s.lon, COUNT(*) as start_trips FROM schema_a.stations s JOIN schema_a.rides r ON s.station_id = r.Start_Station_Id GROUP BY s.station_id, s.lat, s.lon ORDER BY start_trips DESC LIMIT 5
sample_queries.user_input: What are the top 5 most popular starting stations?
